text: Laurent Monsengwo Pasinya (7 October 1939 â€“ 11 July 2021) was a Congolese prelate of the Catholic Church. He was the Archbishop of Kinshasa from 2007 to 2018. He became a cardinal in 2010. Pasinya died on 11 July 2021 under hospice care in Versailles, France at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo Roman Catholic bishops
title: Laurent Monsengwo Pasinya
